title: Bitcoin Unphased by China's Stimulus Plan
description: Hong Kong's Hang Seng Index and the CSI 300 both responded to Beijing's plan to reboot China's domestic stock market, but bitcoin remains in the red.

title: Bitcoin-based stablecoin competing with modern alternatives

title: Founder of Bitcoin alternative calls out Satoshi for holding 1m coins
description: Recently, the creator of a new alternative crypto said Satoshi Nakamoto's large holdings of Bitcoin could potentially contradict the principle of decentralization

title: BREAKING: Arkham Reveals On-Chain Secrets: Bitcoin ETF Addresses Unveiled for BlackRock, Fidelity, Bitwise, and Franklin Templeton
description: Arkham Intelligence has publicized the on-chain addresses for Bitcoin Exchange-Traded Funds (ETFs) managed by BlackRock, Fidelity, Bitwise, and Franklin Templeton. The disclosure includes significant holdings, such as the IBIT iShares Bitcoin Trust’s 28.62K BTC (valued at $1.16B) and the FBTC Fidelity Wise Origin Bitcoin Fund’s 29.91K BTC (valued at $1.21B). title: Gate.io’s Proof of Reserves Implementation Passes Hacken’s Security Audit
